content: the original cabled owl cup cozie design there are 5 owls wrapped around this snuggley cozie **if you found that your cozie stretches too much or is too big go down a needle size ** i m a medium-to-tight knitter so my needle choice did just fine for my project and a cozie should easily fit a medium to large take out cup of coffee this is a great way to practice or introduce yourself to cables *and* make great stocking stuffer gifts for any coffee or tea drinker plus this also makes a great stash busting project if you ve got scraps or extra skeins to get rid of **only approx 14 grams of yarn is needed to knit this item ** 1 https //www zibbet com/knitphomaniac
